allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add replenishment sub-agent for inventory shipment requests

- Add ReplenishmentSkill with triggers for replenish/restock/order keywords
- Add create_shipment_request and get_shipment_requests tools
- Support single and multiple product replenishment in one request
- Handle string product_id format \(e.g., ''FS-111''\) from inventory_status
- Add INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE handling to databricks_client
- Update insights_skill to offer replenishment for low stock warnings
- Register replenishment tools in tool registry and compact definitions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
